description: Ko-oni is a small youkai of the Nura Clan who is often seen in the company of Nattou Kozou, Toufu Kozou and Sannokuchi. About 400 years ago, his hair was black but it has since gone gray except for the top of his head, which is bald. He likes sake and used to play tag with Rikuo when the latter was a child.
name: Ko-oni
